description: Obama Bashes The Media On Day Of Paris' Journalism Terror Attack
title: Obama Takes Shot at Media for Not Promoting Successes
title_page: Obama Takes Shot at Media for Not Promoting Successes | Breitbart
text:
Wednesday, the day gunmen attacked the French magazine Charlie Hebdo in Paris, killing at least 12 people, including two police officers and ten journalists, President Barack Obama took a shot at the media for not promoting his successes, when he spoke at a Ford Motor Company assembly plant in Wayne, Michigan, about the economy.
While touting his administration’s accomplishments, the president said, “America is coming back. You don’t have to take my word for it. The facts are the facts. And let’s face it, a lot of times you know the media doesn’t like reporting on good news.”
Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
